Posts.Content: Jun 2, 2011 05:59PM Grace1961 wrote: I want to add, there is no smell nor do I have a fever, and the draining is yellowish/brownish/clear and is not copiuos so far.
Posts.Title: Pain 11 days out after part. mastectomy? Grace1961 Grace1961

Posts.Content: Grace1961 wrote: I had my second partial mastectomy on May 23. No problems or complications with the surgery, and everything seemed fine.  Of course this time, the surgeon took even more tissue, and wide margins. I never had any pain issues with the first surgery (never even took rx pain meds).  And I didn't with this one either, until today.  My wound where the drain came out is still draining at night (I assume only at night because I lay on that side), I don't have discharge during the day. Today, I woke up with more yellowish discharge that spotted my clothes and the sheets (darn it), although not much.  But I am having pain on and off all day, which surprises me.  Is it common to have pain this far out after surgery?
